bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR FUTURE PAYMENT TRANSACTIONS

nplcit.text: Rosenberg, M. (1998, May 03). Utilities provide ways to prevent seasonal blows to home budgets electric and gas bills can be leveled out to ease big swings in amounts due. Kansas City Star. Retrieved 28 April 2014

abstract.p: A method for the online modification, submission and approval processing of a future payment request to afford a user the ability to renegotiate established loan agreement debt terms in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a computing device, such as a server or server arrangement, is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the computing device, regarding the loan agreement debt terms, presenting received information to a debtor, providing an interactive environment enabling a debtor to modify existing terms, submitting modified terms, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine, and processing a future payment request based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may engage in revising a rejected future payment request in an attempt to reach a satisfactory renegotiation of debt terms.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for resolving transactions
System and method for resolving transactions
método e sistema para regulamentar uma transação, e, sistema para colher informação pertinente a uma transação

abstract.p: MéTODO E SISTEMA PARA REGULAMENTAR UMA TRANSAçãO, E, SISTEMA PARA COLHER INFORMAçãO PERTINENTE A UMA TRANSAçãO. Um sistema e método para on-line de uma transação na qual comunicações de rede são estabelecidas entre um usuário, tal como um devedor, e um servidor, são apresentados. O projeto inclui receber informação, no servidor, relativa à transação, buscar informação disponível pertinente à transação de pelo menos uma fonte externa ao servidor e ao usuário, processar dados da informação disponível usando uma máquina baseada em regras incluindo regras estabelecidas em nome de uma parte para a transação localizada no servidor, e apresentar um conjunto de ofertas de regulamentação de transação ao usuário baseado em pelo menos uma decisão feita pela máquina baseada em regras.
Enquanto on-line, o usuário/devedor pode aceitar uma das ofertas ou se envolver em negociação aprovada adicional de outras ofertas.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE RESOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS

inventor-name.name: IMREY G C HOUSE WILLIAM J III [US]
IMREY G. C.,HOUSE WILLIAM J. III

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for compiling information for resolving transactions

abstract.p: A system and method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The design comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

SYSTEM UND VERFAHREN ZUM ABWICKELN VON TRANSAKTIONEN
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE RESOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS
System and methods for resolving transactions
System und Verfahren zum Abwickeln von Transaktionen
Système et procédés de résolution des transactions

abstract.p: Apparatus for settling a debt transaction, the apparatus comprising a server comprising: means for contacting a debtor by transmitting a communication to the debtor using one of a number of available communication channels, wherein the communication invites the debtor to contact the server for the purpose of attempting to resolve the debt transaction
means for receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction
means for seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the debtor
means for processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server
and means for presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the debtor based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A system and method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The design comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for resolving transactions

abstract.p: A method for settling a transaction is disclosed. The method comprises: receiving information, at a server, regarding the transaction
seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server
processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server

and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to a user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction settlement offer comprises at least one individually selectable offer including at least one decisioned settlement term based on the rules established on behalf of the party to the transaction and available information. Each individually selectable offer is selectable by the user to facilitate settlement of the transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A system and method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The design comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Dynamic credit score alteration

abstract.p: A method for providing credit score information for a user to the user is provided. The method comprises offering the user an option to obtain information related to a credit score via a computer networking arrangement. The method further determines credit score information once the option is selected by the user, and providing the credit score information determined to the user via the computer networking arrangement.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Dynamic credit score alteration

nplcit.text: "Credit Scores, CNNfn", Aug. 12, 2004, Finance Wire

abstract.p: A method for providing credit score information for a user to the user is provided. The method comprises offering the user an option to obtain information related to a credit score via a computer networking arrangement. The method further determines credit score information once the option is selected by the user, and providing the credit score information determined to the user via the computer networking arrangement.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method for future payment transactions

abstract.p: A method for the online modification, submission and approval processing of a future payment request to afford a user the ability to renegotiate established loan agreement debt terms in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the loan agreement debt terms, presenting received information to a debtor, providing an interactive environment enabling a debtor to modify existing terms, submitting modified terms, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine, and processing a future payment request based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may engage in revising a rejected future payment request in an attempt to reach a satisfactory renegotiation of debt terms.

abstract.p: A method for the online modification, submission and approval processing of a future payment request to afford a user the ability to renegotiate established loan agreement debt terms in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the loan agreement debt terms, presenting received information to a debtor, providing an interactive environment enabling a debtor to modify existing terms, submitting modified terms, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine, and processing a future payment request based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. bibliographic-data.invention-title: Enhanced transaction resolution techniques

abstract.p: A method for completing a transaction is presented. The method comprises establishing network communications between a user and a server, receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting an offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction may be one according to a variety of scenarios, and the user may be a appropriate party to the transaction. The user may employ various devices to contact the server and seek to complete the transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Enhanced transaction resolution techniques

abstract.p: A method for completing a transaction is presented. The method comprises establishing network communications between a user and a server, receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting an offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction may be one according to a variety of scenarios, and the user may be a appropriate party to the transaction. The user may employ various devices to contact the server and seek to complete the transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System for resolving transactions

nplcit.text: Kerridge, Ronald D:Tax-Exempt Credit Counseling Organizations and the Future services; Texas Review of Law & Politics 14.2 (Spring 2010):
Maynes, Todd F: Distressed Debt in Disordely and Dysfunctional markets; Taxes 87.3 (Mar 2009): 55-74+
McCawley, harry B: Proposed Regulations for debt instruments calling for one or more continuos analysis-Part 2; Tax Management Memorendum 36.19 (Sep 18, 1995): 267

abstract.p: An apparatus for resolving a debt transaction is provided. The apparatus includes a server having means for contacting the debtor by transmitting a communication to the debtor using one of a number of available communication channels, a credit information seeking module configured to obtain information from a financial information source other than the server and the debtor, and a rules based decision module configured to analyze information to determine a potential resolution strategy for the debt transaction comprising a transaction settlement offer based on creditworthiness of the debtor based on rules established by the creditor.

The server is configured to provide the debtor with the transaction settlement offer, and to attempt to obtain agreement from the debtor to settle the debt transaction based on the at least one transaction settlement offer, and process at least a portion of a payment.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System for resolving transactions

nplcit.text: Kerridge, Ronald D:Tax-Exempt Credit Counseling Organizations and the Future services; Texas Review of Law & Politics 14.2 (Spring 2010)

abstract.p: An apparatus for resolving a debt transaction is provided. The apparatus includes a server having means for contacting the debtor by transmitting a communication to the debtor using one of a number of available communication channels, a credit information seeking module configured to obtain information from a financial information source other than the server and the debtor, and a rules based decision module configured to analyze information to determine a potential resolution strategy for the debt transaction comprising a transaction settlement offer based on creditworthiness of the debtor based on rules established by the creditor.

The server is configured to provide the debtor with the transaction settlement offer, and to attempt to obtain agreement from the debtor to settle the debt transaction based on the at least one transaction settlement offer, and process at least a portion of a payment.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for compiling information for resolving transactions

abstract.p: A system and method for gathering information pertinent to a transaction for purposes of compiling an offer set of at least one offer for settling the transaction is presented. The design comprises a server configured to seek information, the server configured to seek at least one from a group comprising information related to personal data regarding a user, information related to account data regarding a user account, information related to macroeconomic data, and information related to the transaction. The server seeks all information from a source separate from the server and the user.

abstract.p: A method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System for resolving transactions

abstract.p: A system for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The system comprises a server configured to receive communications from a user. The server is further configured to seek available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and user. The server comprises a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction, the rules based engine configured to process data from the available information and present a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System for resolving transactions

abstract.p: A system for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The system comprises a server configured to receive communications from a user. The server is further configured to seek available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and user. The server comprises a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction, the rules based engine configured to process data from the available information and present a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Dynamic credit score alteration

abstract.p: A method for providing credit score information for a user to the user is provided. The method comprises offering the user an option to obtain information related to a credit score via a computer networking arrangement. The method further determines credit score information once the option is selected by the user, and providing the credit score information determined to the user via the computer networking arrangement.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Enhanced transaction resolution techniques

abstract.p: A method for completing a transaction is presented. The method comprises establishing network communications between a user and a server, receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting an offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction may be one according to a variety of scenarios, and the user may be an appropriate party to the transaction. The user may employ various devices to contact the server and seek to complete the transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR COMPILING INFORMATION FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A system and method for gathering information pertinent to a transaction, such as one of a plurality of debts, is presented. The design comprises a server arrangement configured to seek information to compile a transaction settlement offer set, the server arrangement configured to seek at least one from a group comprising information related to personal data regarding a user, information related to account data regarding a user account, information related to macroeconomic data, and information related to the transaction. The server arrangement seeks all information from a source separate from the server arrangement and the user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS

nplcit.text: Kenyon, W. W. (1993). Analysis of the collection cycle. Topics in Health Care Financing, 20(1), 10. Retrieved 09 April 2014
Brothers,Alfred J.,,Jr. (2003). Recovery options for older accounts. Credit Card Management, 16(8), 28-30. Retrieved 09 April 2014

abstract.p: A method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a computing device is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the computing device, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the computing device and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the computing device, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE RESOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A system and method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The design comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

La présente invention concerne un système et un procédé de règlement en ligne d'une transaction, avec établissement de communications par réseau entre un utilisateur tel qu'un débiteur et un serveur. La logique consiste en une réception d'information par le serveur au sujet de la transaction, en une recherche d'information disponible s'appliquant à la transaction à partir d'au moins une source extérieure au serveur et à l'utilisateur, en un traitement des données tirées de l'information disponible au moyen d'un moteur à base de règles incluant des règles établies pour le compte d'une partie prenante de la transaction située au niveau du serveur, et en une présentation d'une offre de règlement de transaction proposée à l'utilisateur sur la base d'au moins une décision faites par le moteur à base de règles.
Pendant les échanges en ligne, l'utilisateur/débiteur peut accepter l'une des offres ou passer à un stade plus avancé et approuvé de la négociation concernant l'offre.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RESOLVING TRANSACTIONS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE RESOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A system and method for the online settling of a transaction in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The design comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting a transaction settlement offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may accept one of the offers or engage in further approved negotiation of other offers.

La présente invention concerne un système et un procédé de règlement en ligne d'une transaction, avec établissement de communications par réseau entre un utilisateur tel qu'un débiteur et un serveur. La logique consiste en une réception d'information par le serveur au sujet de la transaction, en une recherche d'information disponible s'appliquant à la transaction à partir d'au moins une source extérieure au serveur et à l'utilisateur, en un traitement des données tirées de l'information disponible au moyen d'un moteur à base de règles incluant des règles établies pour le compte d'une partie prenante de la transaction située au niveau du serveur, et en une présentation d'une offre de règlement de transaction proposée à l'utilisateur sur la base d'au moins une décision faites par le moteur à base de règles.
Pendant les échanges en ligne, l'utilisateur/débiteur peut accepter l'une des offres ou passer à un stade plus avancé et approuvé de la négociation concernant l'offre.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: DYNAMIC CREDIT SCORE ALTERATION
MODIFICATION DE COTE DE SOLVABILITÉ DYNAMIQUE

abstract.p: A method for providing credit score information for a user to the user is provided. The method comprises offering the user an option to obtain information related to a credit score via a computer networking arrangement. The method further determines credit score information once the option is selected by the user, and providing the credit score information determined to the user via the computer networking arrangement.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant à un utilisateur d'obtenir des informations sur sa cote de solvabilité. Le procédé consiste à offrir à l'utilisateur une option lui permettant d'obtenir des informations sur une cote de solvabilité via une entente de réseau informatique. Le procédé consiste également à déterminer des informations sur la cote de solvabilité une fois que l'option a été choisie par l'utilisateur et à fournir ces informations sur la cote de solvabilité à l'utilisateur via l'entente de réseau informatique.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: DYNAMIC CREDIT SCORE ALTERATION
MODIFICATION DE COTE DE SOLVABILITÉ DYNAMIQUE

abstract.p: A method for providing credit score information for a user to the user is provided. The method comprises offering the user an option to obtain information related to a credit score via a computer networking arrangement. The method further determines credit score information once the option is selected by the user, and providing the credit score information determined to the user via the computer networking arrangement.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant à un utilisateur d'obtenir des informations sur sa cote de solvabilité. Le procédé consiste à offrir à l'utilisateur une option lui permettant d'obtenir des informations sur une cote de solvabilité via une entente de réseau informatique. Le procédé consiste également à déterminer des informations sur la cote de solvabilité une fois que l'option a été choisie par l'utilisateur et à fournir ces informations sur la cote de solvabilité à l'utilisateur via l'entente de réseau informatique.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ENHANCED TRANSACTION RESOLUTION TECHNIQUES
TECHNIQUES AMÉLIORÉES DE RÉSOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A method for completing a transaction is presented. The method comprises establishing network communications between a user and a server, receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting an offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction may be one according to a variety of scenarios, and the user may be an appropriate party to the transaction. The user may employ various devices to contact the server and seek to complete the transaction.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant de solder une transaction. Ce procédé consiste à établir des communications de réseau entre un utilisateur et un serveur, à recevoir des informations, au niveau du serveur, concernant la transaction, à chercher des informations disponibles pertinentes pour la transaction dans au moins une source externe au serveur et à l'utilisateur, à traiter les données extraites des informations disponibles à l'aide d'un moteur fondé sur des règles comprenant des règles établies par une partie de la transaction située au niveau du serveur, et à présenter une offre à l'utilisateur fondée sur au moins une décision fournie par le moteur fondé sur des règles. La transaction peut répondre à différents scénarios et l'utilisateur peut être une partie compétente pour la transaction.
L'utilisateur peut utiliser divers dispositifs pour contacter le serveur et chercher à solder la transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ENHANCED TRANSACTION RESOLUTION TECHNIQUES
TECHNIQUES AMÉLIORÉES DE RÉSOLUTION DE TRANSACTIONS

abstract.p: A method for completing a transaction is presented. The method comprises establishing network communications between a user and a server, receiving information, at the server, regarding the transaction, seeking available information pertinent to the transaction from at least one source external to the server and the user, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine including rules established on behalf of a party to the transaction located at the server, and presenting an offer set to the user based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. The transaction may be one according to a variety of scenarios, and the user may be an appropriate party to the transaction. The user may employ various devices to contact the server and seek to complete the transaction.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant de solder une transaction. Ce procédé consiste à établir des communications de réseau entre un utilisateur et un serveur, à recevoir des informations, au niveau du serveur, concernant la transaction, à chercher des informations disponibles pertinentes pour la transaction dans au moins une source externe au serveur et à l'utilisateur, à traiter les données extraites des informations disponibles à l'aide d'un moteur fondé sur des règles comprenant des règles établies par une partie de la transaction située au niveau du serveur, et à présenter une offre à l'utilisateur fondée sur au moins une décision fournie par le moteur fondé sur des règles. La transaction peut répondre à différents scénarios et l'utilisateur peut être une partie compétente pour la transaction.
L'utilisateur peut utiliser divers dispositifs pour contacter le serveur et chercher à solder la transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR FUTURE PAYMENT TRANSACTIONS
PROCÉDÉ DESTINÉ AU TRAITEMENT DE TRANSACTIONS DE PAIEMENT DIFFÉRÉ

abstract.p: A method for the online modification, submission and approval processing of a future payment request to afford a user the ability to renegotiate established loan agreement debt terms in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the loan agreement debt terms, presenting received information to a debtor, providing an interactive environment enabling a debtor to modify existing terms, submitting modified terms, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine, and processing a future payment request based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may engage in revising a rejected future payment request in an attempt to reach a satisfactory renegotiation of debt terms.

L'invention concerne un procédé destiné au traitement des modifications, des soumissions et des approbations concernant une demande de paiement différé, permettant à un utilisateur de renégocier les termes d'un accord de prêt établis. Dans ce procédé, des communications de réseau sont établies entre un utilisateur, tel qu'un débiteur, et un serveur.

Le procédé consiste à recevoir des informations, au niveau du serveur, concernant les termes de l'accord de prêt, à présenter les informations reçues à un débiteur, à fournir un environnement interactif permettant à un débiteur de modifier les termes existants, à soumettre des termes modifiés, à traiter des données extraites des informations disponibles à l'aide d'un moteur fondé sur des règles, et à traiter une demande de paiement différé sur la base d'au moins une décision fournie par le moteur fondé sur des règles. Lorsqu'il est en ligne, l'utilisateur/débiteur peut décider de revoir une demande de paiement anticipé rejetée en vue d'obtenir une renégociation des termes satisfaisante.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR FUTURE PAYMENT TRANSACTIONS
PROCÉDÉ DESTINÉ AU TRAITEMENT DE TRANSACTIONS DE PAIEMENT DIFFÉRÉ

abstract.p: A method for the online modification, submission and approval processing of a future payment request to afford a user the ability to renegotiate established loan agreement debt terms in which network communications are established between a user, such as a debtor, and a server is presented. The method comprises receiving information, at the server, regarding the loan agreement debt terms, presenting received information to a debtor, providing an interactive environment enabling a debtor to modify existing terms, submitting modified terms, processing data from the available information using a rules based engine, and processing a future payment request based on at least one decision made by the rules based engine. While online, the user/debtor may engage in revising a rejected future payment request in an attempt to reach a satisfactory renegotiation of debt terms.

L'invention concerne un procédé destiné au traitement des modifications, des soumissions et des approbations concernant une demande de paiement différé, permettant à un utilisateur de renégocier les termes d'un accord de prêt établis. Dans ce procédé, des communications de réseau sont établies entre un utilisateur, tel qu'un débiteur, et un serveur.

Le procédé consiste à recevoir des informations, au niveau du serveur, concernant les termes de l'accord de prêt, à présenter les informations reçues à un débiteur, à fournir un environnement interactif permettant à un débiteur de modifier les termes existants, à soumettre des termes modifiés, à traiter des données extraites des informations disponibles à l'aide d'un moteur fondé sur des règles, et à traiter une demande de paiement différé sur la base d'au moins une décision fournie par le moteur fondé sur des règles. Lorsqu'il est en ligne, l'utilisateur/débiteur peut décider de revoir une demande de paiement anticipé rejetée en vue d'obtenir une renégociation des termes satisfaisante.
